hero.subheadline: Professional, licensed electricians serving residential and commercial clients from Whangaparaoa to Orewa. Safety first, quality guaranteed.
hero.headline: Reliable Electrical Services on the Hibiscus Coast

services.title: Residential Electrical
services.description: Complete home wiring, repairs, and upgrades. From new outlets to full rewires, we keep your home safe and powered.

services.title: Commercial Electrical
services.description: Reliable power solutions for businesses. Shop fit-outs, data cabling, and maintenance contracts available.

services.title: New Builds & Renovations
services.description: Expert planning and installation for your new dream home or renovation project. We work seamlessly with your builders.

services.title: Lighting & LED Upgrades
services.description: Energy-efficient lighting designs. Transform your space with modern LED downlights, pendants, and outdoor lighting.

services.title: Switchboards & Safety
services.description: Upgrade old fuse boards to modern RCD-protected switchboards. Comprehensive safety checks and compliance certification.

services.title: Fault Finding & Repairs
services.description: Experiencing power outages or flickering lights? Our diagnostic experts find and fix electrical faults fast.
